title: Lemme see if I got this right

replies.body:
Lol they arent even targetting bots. 
They are targetting the people who are victims to others trolling that retaliate with "naughty words", and this isnt even including racist or self harm.

I mean looking at your match history you honestly donâ€™t look like you deserve to climb. Of your last 15 games you have won 5 and in almost all of the games you have lost you have an awful KDA and your playing support and you consistently have one of the lowest Ward placed on your team.
